questions.question: 1. The impact test can be used to ____ .

answers.a: to compare the torsional strength of two specimens
answers.b: to compare the tensile strength of two specimens
answers.c: to compare the impact strength of two specimens

explanations.a: Torsional test is used to compare the torsional strength of two specimens
explanations.b: Tensile test is used to compare the tensile strength of two specimens
explanations.c: The impact test is used to compare the impact strength of two specimens.

questions.question: 2. What is the principal use of the impact tests?

answers.b: To determine if the material has been subjected to heat treatment

explanations.b: The principal or main reason that the impact test is conducted upon a material is to ascertain if the material has undergone the required accurate heat treatment.
